    • Uses of SignalException in missing.game.characters

      Methods in missing.game.characters that throw SignalException

      void Player.performAction(Player player)
      This method throws a SignalException which means that a trade must be initiated between the other player and this player.

      Since the merchant will always be inside the shop, this method does not do anything.
